overview: Motel Sex is as hot and sleazy as anything that ever happened in a rented room from The Plaza to the cheapest dive out on the interstate. Under the masterful hand - and we know where that hand has been - of director Gino Colbert, Motel Sex gives you everything you paid for... and then some! Better tell room service to send up some extra towels. You're gonna need 'em.
title: Motel Sex
